hero.title: Greater Task
hero.subtitle: A simple, collaborative task tracking app for groups of any size.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: Create groups for yourself or others with Greater Task. In these groups, you can create and share tasks that everyone can tackle together.

step1.title: 1. Create a Group
step1.description: Set up private or public groups tailored to your team, friends, or community.

step2.title: 2. Add Tasks
step2.description: Quickly create tasks, assign responsibilities, and set deadlines.

step3.title: 3. Collaborate
step3.description: Everyone in the group can contribute and track progress together.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Greater Task?
whyChoose.description: Built for simplicity without sacrificing functionality. Perfect for teams of any size.

simpleAndFast.title: Simple & Fast
simpleAndFast.description: No complex setup or overwhelming features. Just create a group and start collaborating.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your data stays secure with flexible privacy controls for every group.

worksEverywhere.title: Works Everywhere
worksEverywhere.description: Access your tasks from any device, anywhere, anytime.

realtimeUpdates.title: Real-time Updates
realtimeUpdates.description: See changes instantly as your team updates tasks and makes progress.

callToAction.title: Ready to get organized?
callToAction.description: Join thousands of teams already using Greater Task to stay productive and collaborate effectively.
